description: Detects commands that indicate a Raccine removal from an end system. Raccine is a free ransomware protection tool.
name: Raccine Uninstall
query: ((process.command_line.text:*taskkill\ * AND process.command_line.text:*RaccineSettings.exe*) OR (process.command_line.text:*reg.exe* AND process.command_line.text:*delete* AND process.command_line.text:*Raccine\ Tray*) OR (process.command_line.text:*schtasks* AND process.command_line.text:*\/DELETE* AND process.command_line.text:*Raccine\ Rules\ Updater*))
author: Florian Roth
